summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2511, for the improvement of 4th Avenue South from Seattle Boulevard to Holgate Street, all in the City of Seattle, by construction of an asphalt top on existing bridge, under Ordinance No. 28670 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
